entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor.platform.readStringField not working anymore after dotnet 7.0 upgrade #78731
  • [NativeAOT] Signalless Hijack #78724
    Future
  • [Crossgen2] Fix RVA field access in composite mode #78723
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: IndexOfAnyValues<T>.Contains(T) #78722
  • FileNameStar_NeedsEncoding_EncodedAndDecodedCorrectly test is failing in CI #78718
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] System.Numerics.Vectors test fails to compile with an assert. #78717
    8.0.0
  • [Android] SSLStream throws 'Handshake has already been started' on API level 26 #78716
    8.0.0
  • [Android] Investigate support for SSLStream below API Level 24 #78715
    8.0.0
  • JIT: RBO still introduces data races #78713
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Provide APIs to create JsonPropertyInfo based on PropertyInfo #78711
    8.0.0
  • Blazor Wasm TimeZoneInfo.Local.GetUtcOffset is returning 7:53:00 in PST zone #78721
  • [wasm] consider bumping devDependencies #78708
  • Enable baseline validation for packages introduced in .NET 7 #78705
    8.0.0
  • Review usage of nullable suppressions (especially `!`) in CodeExporter.cs #78704
    8.0.0
  • Generics implementations with nullable of non struct don't match type #78699
  • TarEntry: link target path checks #78695
  • The performance of java is almost twice that of C# #78691
  • WebAssembly.Sdk - Unsuppressable warnings #78690
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Change Console Startup Messages #78689
  • HTTPS performance degradation in HttpClient after .NET 7 migration #78686
  • DataTable, the result of the `new` operator is checked for `null` #78684
  • Allow modeling ref fields in the class constructor interpreter #78681
    Future
  • Aggressive GC: No Memory Decommit until 2nd GC (LOH only?) #78679
  • Add trimming analysis tools #78671
    8.0.0

Closed

  • TypeLoadException in System.Security.Cryptography.Xml v7.0.0.0 for EncryptedData in .NET 4.8 project referencing .NET Standard 2.0 library #78652
  • Test failure Regressions/coreclr/0099/AboveStackLimit/AboveStackLimit.sh #78622
  • Attribute.CoreCLR, redundant check #78683
  • Exception from System.ServiceModel in Net 6 or 7 #78694
  • Test failure JIT/Directed/nullabletypes/isinst_do/isinst_do.sh #78623
  • how can we trim dll unused? #78633
  • Simplify Microsoft.Win32.Registry sources split #77974
    Future
  • OOB Library's AssemblyVersion is inconsistent between ref and src assemblies in servicing #63467
    6.0.x
  • Polymorphic deserialization requires disriminator property order to be first in json. #78338
  • Calling GetType on resource from loaded assembly returns type from currently executing runtime version, not the assembly target runtime version #78436
  • Generic math WriteLittleEndian is slow #78662
  • Feature suggestion - Obfuscator #78687
  • [API Proposal]: Add CutAll method #78324
  • Unable to build: Unable to load Analyzer assembly #77723
  • NativeAOT ignores PdbFile compiler option #78337
  • [mono] Hot Reload: support adding instance fields #63643
    8.0.0
  • [pgo] Assert failure: (pCtx->Pc < codestart) || (pCtx->Pc >= codeend) #77156
    8.0.0
  • [pgo] windows arm/arm64 test jobs almost always timeout #77155
    8.0.0
  • JSMarshalerType, a value is checked for equality to `MarshalerType.Single` twice #78682
    8.0.0
  • Using json source generators prevents the possibility to serialize anonymous objects in views #78164
  • Performance Benchmark #78451
  • Serious flaw that I believe can be exploited by people with no good intentions... #78639
  • JsonSerializer.Deserialize throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException or JsonException reading json file greater than 16KB on .net7.0 but not on .net6.0 #78692
  • dotnet.create() does not throw error when WebAssembly.instantiateStreaming() fails #77882
  • [wasm] Clean up environment helpers duplicated from emscripten #74423
    8.0.0
  • JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.X86._Fma_Vector256.Program.MultiplyAddSingle fails in consolidated Vector test on OSX #78079
    8.0.0
  • Test failure in ilconformance jmp #78579
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT compiler assert on static abstract GVM #78116
  • RuntimeType.GetGenericTypeDefinition() performance issue #73860
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • NativeAOT exports marked functions for exe apps. #78738
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove char[] allocations from RegistryKey and List copy to Array #78737
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • Allow inlining for ldsfld + value-type #78736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Explicitly omit RID from crossgen2 binary path #78735
    Servicing-consider, area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix netfx build for S.S.C.Xml nuget package #78734
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.x
  • Explicitly omit RID from crossgen2 binary path #78733
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [mono][wasm] Disable AOTing methods which contain catch clauses insid… #78732
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/7.0] Don't bind against non-shipping contract assemblies #78730
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.x
  • Change MetricSpec.TryParse to be Parse #78729
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 8.0.0
  • Remove unnecessary % in ToFourDigitYear #78728
    area-System.Globalization, 8.0.0
  • Fix some duplicative null checks #78727
    area-System.Xml
  • [wasm] bump devDependencies to rollup 3 and TypeScript 4.9 #78726
    area-Build-mono
  • Remove unnecessary null check in DataTable #78725
    area-System.Data
  • Update NugetPackagingVersion to 6.2.2 #78720
  • [release/7.0] Update a few dependencies #78710
  • JIT: Set GTF_ORDER_SIDEEFF for some nodes with invisible dependencies #78698
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reenable a test after 78358 is fixed. #78697
    area-System.Xml
  • [wasm] Use "node:crypto" to polyfill getRandomValues on older node #78696
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Place frozen objects into dehydrated section #78688
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Extend preinitialization interpreter to support calling `string::Length` #78680
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2051445 #78677
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [6.0] Fix the tiering delay to account for changing IL/native code versions during the delay #78670
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [7.0] Fix the tiering delay to account for changing IL/native code versions during the delay #78669
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 7.0.x

Merged

  • Fix netfx build for S.S.C.Xml nuget package #78665
    area-System.Security
  • Add readmes for System.Security* and related libraries #78674
    area-System.Security
  • Delete redundant check #78702
    area-System.Runtime
  • [mono][wasm] Disable AOTing methods which contain catch clauses insid… #78653
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Teach internal `printf` about 'z' #78685
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove TrimStart in PAX extended attributes #78707
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Clean-up `Microsoft.Win32.Registry` and remove the non-Windows code. #77996
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • Clarify System.Diagnostics.Process' README #78719
    area-Meta
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in CoreLib #78678
    area-System.Runtime, 8.0.0
  • Clean up members/signatures/visibility in deps_format/resolver #78572
    area-Host
  • Cleanup GenFacades logic and don't bind against non-shipping contract assemblies #78703
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • avoid alpn allocation on windows #74619
    area-System.Net.Security, os-windows, 8.0.0
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in System.Net.Http #78660
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Introduce System.IO.Hashing and System.DateTime area labels #78673
    area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • Add readmes for System.IO.Compression* #78645
    documentation, area-System.IO.Compression, 8.0.0
  • [hot_reload] Add instance fields #76462
    area-EnC-mono
  • Reduce private points of contact between frozen collections and ImmutableArray<T>. #78675
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Performance improvements to vectorized Span.Reverse #78650
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in Regex.Escape #78667
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] fix duplicate check #78693
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] propagate aborted startup to top most promise #78644
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] clean duplicated environment helpers #78643
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Fix FMA tests to use Math.FusedMultiplyAdd for fallback #78672
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Create a shared apicompat suppression file for CoreLib #78654
    area-Infrastructure
  • Use IndexOfAnyInRange in StripBidiControlCharacters #78658
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • Fix the other jmp.il after #78501 (more for #78579) #78656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in X500NameEncoder #78676
    area-System.Security, 8.0.0
  • Cache GenericTypeDefinition to improve perf #78288
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, community-contribution

Updated

  • [wasm] More jiterpreter cleanup #78519
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Keep FieldSeq in AssertionDesc #78616
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rewrite Enum and add {ISpanFormattable}.TryFormat #78580
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Adding new ReadyToRun helper for static cctor #76898
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] Fix to move to using GC pal within coreclr on Linux #78521
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix commit accounting for large pages #78564
    area-GC-coreclr
  • fix DualMode ReceiveFrom on macOS #78261
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-mac-os-x
  • Update assembly version from hardcoded to MajorVersion #78354
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] Improve controlling which scenarios test libraries should be run against #78495
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Improviments in debugging in async methods #78651
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasi][draft] build WASI #77823
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix DiagnosticSource to work with NativeAOT #78532
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in Uri #78666
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • avoid allocations in SendTo and Quic #78591
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Anonymous pipe resource leak when DisposeLocalCopyOfClientHandle is not called #78562
    area-System.IO, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • Allow interop resolvers to return self handle #78004
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono, community-contribution
  • Implement Shuffle, GetString, and GetItems on Random{NumberGenerator} #78598
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/7.0] Fix ALC lookup from the DAC #78420
    Servicing-approved, area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 7.0.2
  • WIP: Poof of concept port of interleave feature #78374
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Refactoring tests to support both external and loopback servers #74579
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • Correctly handle false on Add/Take from underlying collection in BlockingCollection #77936
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in Xml #78664
    area-System.Xml, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger][libs] Documentation: How to debug library tests #77368
    documentation, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Revert don't need to escape special characters anymore #78320
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Removed range checks have ordered side effects (#78554) #78561
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make System.Reflection.Emit public types abstract #78544
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/7.0] [mono][wasm] Handle delegates decorated with [UnmanagedFunctionPointe… #78426
    Servicing-approved, area-Interop-mono, 7.0.x
  • Extend ProcessStartInfo to allow setting LOGON_NETCREDENTIALS_ONLY #77637
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Add XxHash128 #77944
    community-contribution, area-System.IO.Hashing
  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C Marshal: object tracker support #78280
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Adding the Vector512 and Vector512<T> types #76642
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-22
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Support some throwing operators via throw helper blocks #2100

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test project for .NET 7 Android project not working. #29172
  • Incorrect path packaging native libraries whenever file name contains multiple dots #29170
  • Issues switching from .NET SDK 6.0.x to 7.0.100 #29164
  • Hot Reload just doesn't work. #29163

Closed

  • Test failed in CI: Microsoft.NET.Build.Tests.ReferenceExeTests.ReferencedExeCanRunWhenPublishedWithTrimming(referenceExeInCode: False) #29008
  • dotnet new returns wrong exit code when required parameter is not specified with dotnet sdk 7 #29157
    7.0.1xx
  • [release/7.0.2xx] System.NullReferenceException when running dotnet watch run #29085

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove tmp from the default includes for tests #29180
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29158
    Area-dotnet new
  • Make `dotnet publish` use `Release` by default in 8.0+ Projects #29155
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Make sure the test theories go into different folders. #29154
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make all public API in dotnet-watch.dll internal and sealed. #28260
    feature-dotnetwatch, Area-Watch

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #29132
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [gh-23135] use parent path of manifest file path as rootConfigDirectory #24935
  • Migrate the nuget state from earlier SDKs #29040
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add RidSpecific, Make Apps RID Specific By Default & RID Now FDD By Default in 8.0+ #28412
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Migrate the nuget state from earlier SDKs #29039
    Area-Infrastructure
  • 'dotnet configure add' command for adding new config to a solution file #29139
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2051302 #28957
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Introduce MSBuild task frontend for the Roslyn-based GenAPI #29146
    Area-GenAPI
  • Template verifier adoption in CommonTemplateTests #28707
    Area-dotnet new, Area-Common templates
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #29127
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29094
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-22
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Proposal: extend the set of things allowed in expression trees #2545
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: Avoid synthesizing parameterless struct constructors #5552

PullRequests

Created

  • Provide spec for V8 proposal constraints-in-overrides #6738

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Exception thrown on solution load in VSMac #65573
  • Add editorconfig support for `is null` instead of == null (and `not` variant) #65572
  • Roslyn - .Net core solution Compilation Fails #65567
  • VerifyAllCodeStyleFixersAreSupportedByCodeCleanup tests are failing #65566
    17.5
  • Debug-only test failures in ExternalDiagnosticUpdateSourceTests #65563
  • Analyzers created with Microsoft.CodeAnalysis 4.4.0 cannot be used with .net 6 #65562

Closed

  • Types are not suggested after `required` modifier #65556
  • 'Use pattern matching' should prefer 'Coalesce with throw expression' #65323
  • Latest LSIF generator explodes failing to find service for ILspHoverResultCreationService #65367
    17.5
  • Not able to get symbols for Referenced dlls when loading a solution async #25311
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33121.346 #65554

PullRequests

Created

  • View Call Hierarchy - fix thread block (#65452) #65574
    Area-IDE
  • Fix stale inline diagnostics #65571
    Area-IDE
  • Make sure the container syntax node is not GlobalStatements #65570
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65569
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Bump mac editor and implement CocoaTextBufferVisibilityTracker #65568
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add asserts for debug only test failures and fix tests #65565
    Test, Tenet-Reliability
  • Fix expected number of unsupported diagnostic IDs in a test #65564
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #65561
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move to multi-column primary keys for our sqlite database. #65553
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Semantic Snippets - Fix snippet priority in completion list #65103
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #65110
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to main #65555
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65495
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • [EnC] Allow reordering of top level statements #65560
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix handling blocks in top level code. #65557
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Results of running the arrow-placement analyzer on roslyn #65475
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add additional cases whre 'use coalesce expression' can simplify code. #65371
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix MEF composition used for the LSIF generator #65512
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #65552
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix null ref in add-import #65549
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Simplify how options are checked in the tagger. #65543
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #65551
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Out arguments do not contribute val escape #64784
    Area-Compilers
  • Update to latest version of protocol with new pull diagnostic types #65514
    Area-IDE
  • Don't complete parenthesis after 'new' if the type has nested types #63015
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Only complete () if constructor is accessible #65542
    Area-IDE
  • Move IDS_FeatureXXX checks out of the parser #65500
    Area-Compilers
  • Use RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan for array initialization with relevant primitives #61414
    Area-Compilers
  • Emit `ParamArrayAttribute` for synthesized delegates #65533
    Area-Compilers
  • Add lambda defaults/`params` tests from the test plan review #65458
    Area-Compilers
  • Move some severity configurations to globalconfig #65274
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Work some 'scoped' issues on IDE #65407
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Support semantic tokens output in LSIF generator #65548
    Area-IDE, Community
  • WIP: Support fine-grained diagnostic tagging. #65547
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot have a property called "Model" ona class when model binding on postback #45240
  • Consider adding id property to the Blazor WASM manifest.json file #45239
  • Blazor WASM: Can't pass WebAuthn PublicKeyCredential from JS to .NET #45236
    Discussions
  • [Blazor] Add missing logging #45234
    Backlog
  • Deadlock in Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Testing on .NET 7 #45233
  • [Feature Request] Merging splatted attributes in Blazor #45230
    Backlog
  • Explictily log working directory and let user know it will be used as content root path by default. #45229
  • DataProtectionBuilder API enhancement #45228

Closed

  • Incorrect OpenApi documentation in Minimal API when using WithOpenApi extension method #45192
    8.0-preview1
  • HttpSys request header dictionary does not remove headers when Remove() is called #43230
    8.0-preview1
  • Http1AndHttp2 should warn if Tls is disabled #43837
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Create a field for @ref like x:Name in xaml #45181
  • [OIDC] - Failed to authenticate - Regression after upgrading to .NET 7 #45187
  • Semingly random CorrelationCookieNotFound issues #45166
  • Docs - Minimal API - Document your APIs #44257
    7.0.0
  • Microsoft.NET.Sdk.BlazorWebAssembly.Tests crashed on Darwin CI leg #43926
    8.0-MQ

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Fix response code description in Minimal APIs #45244
    Servicing-consider, area-web-frameworks
  • Add DateOnly and TimeOnly to MVC Model Binding #45243
    area-web-frameworks
  • Update SauceLabs Connection version #45242
    area-signalr
  • Enable `UsePkce` by default for Google and Facebook auth #45235
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Spa proxy enhancements #45232
    area-runtime
  • Fix for W3C cookie logging #45226
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix response code description in Minimal APIs #45231
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • [feature/green-threads] Update dependencies #45241
    area-infrastructure
  • HttpSys request header dictionary does not remove headers when Remove() is called #44860
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Update @types/Webpack #45211
    area-signalr, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • HttpSys request headers Keys and Count both allocate #45156
    Perf, area-runtime, servers-httpsys, community-contribution
  • Add OnPrepareResponseAsync #45062
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [Api Controllers] Infer parameter source from ElementType for IEnumerable #45173
    area-web-frameworks
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2051204 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • Route tooling: Support component routes #44656
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor
  • Add support for comment syntax to route detector #45185
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks
  • Add Kestrel named pipes transport #44426
    area-runtime
  • Support `sub` as `ExternalLoginInfo.ProviderKey` #45198
    area-identity, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-22
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • Add the ALC to `DumpMT` #3508

Updated

  • [Dotnet Monitor] Add Metadata Support For `CounterPayload` #3498

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Metatada file "MyApp.dll" could not be found, on all default solutions on Visual Studio Mac #11567
  • [WiP] KeyboardManager for interacting with platform keyboard #11565
    Backlog
  • ITextInput.ShowSoftInputOnFocus to indicate if you want the keyboard to display when a control becomes focused #11562
    Backlog
  • [iOS / macOS] scrollview/collectionview don't render behind tabs #11561
    Backlog
  • Swapping MainPage performance ( black screen) #11560
    Backlog
  • Carousel view not updating it's position on initial interaction #11559
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Scrollviewer not scrolling #11558
    Backlog
  • ContentView Touch Interaction works inappropriately when placing one above another ContentView. #11555
    Backlog
  • [Android] Toolbar item icon and text disappears when reopening from recent applications. #11552
  • Page title won't update when switching tabs with top bars inside a TabBar inside a shell on Android. Re-introduced #11549
    Backlog
  • Running on windows 11 doesn't live up to expectations, but Android is right #11547

Closed

  • Text input of Entry and Editor break modal visualization #7861
  • .net maui android app not working when deployed to play store when using firebase nuget packages #11538
  • FileSavePicker throws "Invalid window handle" error #11527
    Backlog
  • Unpackaged app compilation fail due to space in profile name #11518
  • .NET Maui on dotnet 7.0 Windows platform (WindowsApplicationSDK 1.1.5) crashes with System.ExecutionEngineException in Application.Start in Main #11546
  • Stepper IsEnabled can't be changed at runtime on Android #11050
    Backlog
  • Can't change ImageSource on Button on Android #8459
    Backlog
  • FlyoutItemIsVisible should accept a "BindableObject" (i.e. it should be data bound) #10960
    Backlog
  • [Bug] When navigating the page as PushModelAsync, the content page background color is always black even when the content page background color is set as transparent. #11040
    Backlog
  • IOS Contentpage BackgroundColor Transparent not working #8526
  • ocr for dotnet MAUI #11480

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Higher-level API over ExecuteUpdate for variable property sets #29654
  • How to map a value object to a row in the database? #29653
  • How to specify an optional SplitToTable configuration #29652
  • Invalid Dependency in Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Relational #29651
  • add-migration throw ： Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'key') #29649
  • CompiledQuery with ExpressionTree #29648
  • SaveChanges circular dependency in unique unfiltered index #29647
  • Condition's order will cause different result when using .Contains() to search string cross varchar and nvarchar columns #29646

Closed

  • EFCore 7.0 Bug - Invalid Operation Exception RE "Temporary Value" #29570

PullRequests

Created

  • Use correct parameter in query based on type mapping #29650

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-22
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Build dotnet6 for Rocky Linux 8.6 is failed #15010

PullRequests

Merged

  • Remove the 7.0.1xx table since that's now in servicing. #14898
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #15028

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #14995
